name: International Aero Academy
about: International Aero Academy is a premier flight academy owned and managed by former executives of major, regional, international, cargo, and charter airlines. Our leadership includes Gerald Gitner, former Chairman and CEO of TWA, and Steven Markhoff, with over 22 years of executive experience in the airline industry. Our Chief Flight Instructor, Marshall Shelstrom, has extensive experience as a commercial pilot and flight instructor. We offer comprehensive aviation training, leveraging the expertise of our seasoned management and instructional team. Our programs are designed to prepare students for successful careers in aviation, with a focus on rigorous training and supportive mentorship. International Aero Academy is committed to providing top-tier aviation education, ensuring our graduates are well-equipped to excel in the global aviation industry.
